issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I just tried to create a launch configuration using the GUI and received an Internal Server Error.  
The eucaconsole.log shows this error:
{code}
2015-01-05 15:59:05 ERROR Error handling request
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/async.py", line 45, in handle
    self.handle_request(listener, req, client, addr)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/ggevent.py", line 151, in handle_request
    super(GeventWorker, self).handle_request(*args)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/async.py", line 93, in handle_request
    respiter = self.wsgi(environ, resp.start_response)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 251, in __call__
    response = self.invoke_subrequest(request, use_tweens=True)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 227, in invoke_subrequest
    response = handle_request(request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 80, in __call__
    response = self.handler(request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 53, in tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 42, in tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/tweens.py", line 21, in excview_tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 161, in handle_request
    response = view_callable(context, request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 319, in attr_view
    return view(context, request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 295, in predicate_wrapper
    return view(context, request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 237, in _secured_view
    return view(context, request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 345, in rendered_view
    result = view(context, request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 462, in _class_requestonly_view
    inst = view(request)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/views/launchconfigs.py", line 406, in __init__
    'default_vpc_network': self.get_default_vpc_network(),
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/views/launchconfigs.py", line 516, in get_default_vpc_network
    return default_vpc[0]
IndexError: list index out of range
{code}

Version Info:
{code}
[root@h-07 ~]# rpm -qi eucaconsole
Name        : eucaconsole                  Relocations: (not relocatable)
Version     : 4.1.0                             Vendor: Eucalyptus Systems, Inc.
Release     : 0.0.5089.297.20150105git8424f47.el6   Build Date: Mon 05 Jan 2015 09:57:41 AM PST
Install Date: Mon 05 Jan 2015 01:26:12 PM PST      Build Host: ip-172-16-20-72
Group       : Unspecified                   Source RPM: eucaconsole-4.1.0-0.0.5089.297.20150105git8424f47.el6.src.rpm
Size        : 10264348                         License: BSD and MIT and OFL
Signature   : (none)
{code}
fields.summary: Unable to create launch configurations using GUI

comments.body: Hmmm...I can no longer reproduce this.  It happened after I upgraded and now it is no longer happening.  I will close as not reproducible.
